title: 24th Annual Free Comic Book Day
description: Celebration at participating local comic shops, offering free comic books to attendees.

title: Old Stone House Artisans Bazaar
description: A market featuring local artisans, taking place in Washington Park (Park Slope).

title: Black Zine Fair
description: A gathering celebrating zine culture at Powerhouse Arts (Gowanus), featuring various zine creators and their works.

title: 1,000 Free Smash Burger Giveaway
description: A promotional event at Smashy’s new location, offering free burgers to the first attendees.

title: Woofstock: Badass Animal Rescue Spring Fest Block Party
description: A block party celebrating animals and rescue efforts, featuring activities and vendors.
address: President Street between 3rd Ave and Nevins (Gowanus)

title: Brooklyn Film Camera Yard Sale
description: A yard sale for film camera enthusiasts, featuring various vendors and items for sale.

title: Queens Night Market
description: An outdoor market featuring food vendors, artisans, and live entertainment, starting with a sneak preview.
address: New York Hall of Science at Flushing Meadows Corona Park

title: Kawaii Holiday Market
description: A market celebrating kawaii culture with vendors, activities, and more, taking place over the weekend.

title: 5 Borough Bazaar at Grand Bazaar NYC
description: A vibrant market featuring local vendors and artisans, taking place indoors and outdoors.

title: 4th Annual Gjergj Kastrioti Skenderbeu Fair
description: A cultural fair celebrating the heritage and contributions of the Albanian community.
address: Corner of Crescent Ave + Arthur Ave (Bronx)

title: 25th Annual Coney Island Film Festival
description: A film festival showcasing independent films at Coney Island USA.

title: Annual Margaret Mead Film Festival
description: A film festival at the American Museum of Natural History featuring documentaries and discussions.

title: 15th Annual Lower East Side Film Festival
description: A film festival celebrating independent filmmakers and their works.

title: Guided by Animals
description: A film series at Metrograph featuring animal-themed films.

title: Scenes from the 'End of History'
description: A film series at Metrograph featuring films that explore historical themes.

title: The Time That Remains
description: A film series at Metrograph featuring films that reflect on time and existence.

title: Drunken Shakespearean Star Wars Performances
description: A comedic performance series blending Shakespeare and Star Wars themes.

title: Xanadu Afterglow: May the Fourth Be on Wheels All-Ages Skate Party
description: A roller skating party celebrating Star Wars Day with music and fun activities.

title: May the Fourth Cantina Party
description: A themed party celebrating Star Wars Day with music and drinks.
cost: Free with RSVP before 8:30 pm ($10 after)

title: Jizz! at the Cantina Disco Drag Show
description: A drag show celebrating Star Wars themes with music and performances.

title: The People’s Ball: Style is a Revolution
description: An inclusive fashion event celebrating personal style and creativity.

title: Torch + Crown Beer Garden
description: Returns to Union Square Pavilion for the season, offering a vibrant atmosphere for socializing and enjoying drinks.
